plot: That's the question comedian Louie Cappa wonders as he tells his childhood friends he is different. Can straight guys and gay guys really be friends?
title: My Life as a Troll
plot_es: That's the question comedian Louie Cappa wonders as he tells his childhood friends he is different. Can straight guys and gay guys really be friends?
plot_en: That's the question comedian Louie Cappa wonders as he tells his childhood friends he is different. Can straight guys and gay guys really be friends?
